task.title: Power agent session - ready for tasks

events.content: Fixed cloud link auth flow - two bugs: Fixed cloud link auth flow - two bugs

raw.question: Fixed cloud link auth flow - two bugs
raw.chosen: Fixed cloud link auth flow - two bugs
raw.reasoning: 1) Cloud link page checked for data.userId but API returns data.authenticated + data.user.id. 2) Login page ignored return URL param, so after login it went to /app instead of back to cloud link page

events.content: Fixed login page return URL support: Fixed login page return URL support

raw.question: Fixed login page return URL support
raw.chosen: Fixed login page return URL support
raw.reasoning: Added useSearchParams to read return query param and redirect back after login instead of always going to /app

events.content: Added Suspense boundary to login page: Added Suspense boundary to login page

raw.question: Added Suspense boundary to login page
raw.chosen: Added Suspense boundary to login page
raw.reasoning: useSearchParams requires Suspense for Next.js static generation - wrapped LoginContent in Suspense with LoginLoading fallback

events.content: Added useSearchParams/Suspense rule to react-dashboard.md: Added useSearchParams/Suspense rule to react-dashboard.md

raw.question: Added useSearchParams/Suspense rule to react-dashboard.md
raw.reasoning: Prevents future build failures - useSearchParams requires Suspense boundary for Next.js static generation

events.content: Changed update-workspaces condition to use explicit result check: Changed update-workspaces condition to use explicit result check

raw.question: Changed update-workspaces condition to use explicit result check
raw.chosen: Changed update-workspaces condition to use explicit result check
raw.reasoning: success() checks entire dependency chain including skipped build-base. Using always() + needs.build-and-push.result == 'success' checks only direct dependency

events.content: Changed skipRestart to false in update-workspaces: Changed skipRestart to false in update-workspaces

raw.question: Changed skipRestart to false in update-workspaces
raw.chosen: Changed skipRestart to false in update-workspaces
raw.reasoning: If no active agents, workspace should restart immediately to apply new image since there's no work to disrupt

retrospective.summary: General session - mixed work on cloud link auth, docker workflow, and React rules
